summary: Small spell pack for one of my personas
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=4]How to obtain:[/size]
Console or any mod that gives u other mods stuffs..

Requirements:
None

Log:

First Sun - Summons my great sword.

Second Sun - Summons my Katana.

Crush - I can keep fighting..
Increase 2h skill by 20%, restores my stamina 5 points per second for 11 seconds. (Lesser power)

Terror - Hate me now!
Restores my health and stamina by 8 points per second for 30 seconds. (Lesser power)

Zombyed Slayer- Brains..necks.. hearts...whatever...i need it all...
Summons my Katana, increase 2h skill by 300%, damaging my health 5 points per second for 22 seconds. (Lesser Power)

Black Salvo - Watch this..
Summons my great sword, increases 2h skill by 100%, take 80% less damage, calls a storm for 60 seconds. (Power)

Insomniac - I'm my fathers sins.
Slows time to 30% of normal time and calls a storm for 2 minutes. (Power)

Devil Enchanced - The Devil told no lies to me..
Creates a blizzard, fortify destruction skill by 65%, fortify stamina by 300 points, fortify 2h skill by 150% for 30 seconds. (Power)
[/size]


[size=4]Would like to add: (Can someone implement this in this mod or be able to merge your mod with this one?)[/size]

Powers:
Death Equilibrium -
Summons Second Sun, Two-Handed weapons do twice as much damage, Standing power attacks do 25% bonus damage with a chance to decapitate your enemies, Can do a two-handed power attack while sprinting that does double critical damage, creates a firey storm.

Devil Enchanced -
Creates a blizzard, fortify destruction skill by 65%, fortify stamina by 300 points, fortify 2h skill by 150%, Cast Expert level Destruction spells for half magicka for 30 seconds.

Death Diety -
Fire spells do 35% more damage, Frost spells do 35% more damage, Shock spells do 35% more damage, Dual casting a Destruction spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version for 24 seconds.

Weeping - Summons First Sun, Sideways power attacks with two-handed weapons hit all targets in front of you for 11 seconds. Drains stamina by 1 point for 22 seconds.

Second Breath - This surge of energy feels Deathly!
Power attacks with two-handed weapons cost 10% less stamina for 15 seconds.

First Breath -
Restores 200 points of stamina. Damages my health by 50 points. Two-Handed weapons do twice as much damage for 30 seconds.

Perks Used for powers:
Barbarian rank 5                Two-Handed weapons do twice as much damage.

Champion's Stance         Power attacks with two-handed weapons cost 25% less stamina.

Devastating Blow         Standing power attacks do 25% bonus damage with a chance to decapitate your enemies.

Great Critical Charge         Can do a two-handed power attack while sprinting that does double critical damage.

Augmented Flames     1     Fire spells do 25% more damage.

Augmented Frost     1     Frost spells do 25% more damage.

Augmented Shock     1     Shock spells do 25% more damage.

Destruction Dual Casting        Dual casting a Destruction spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.

Expert Destruction         Cast Expert level Destruction spells for half magicka.


[size=4]Recommended Complimentary Mods:

A Sword Accursed by s0680535
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58611/?

Blades Samurai Armour and Kimonos by Prime
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704/?

Weapons Of The Shogunate 1_06 by Moraelin
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11983/?

Corpse Preparation - True Necromancy by Mojo
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35378/?

Fudou Myouou Katana and Tachi by China-YYK Moral cat
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53872/?

Katana Crafting by lautasantenni
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8489/?

Oriental Swordsmanship animation of East Asia by cyh0405
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70108/?


Install:

Use NMM to install
Or
Dragon in the data folder like a messy drunk chick[/size]
author: Yyzi
